content.description:
Read this advertisement.

課後英語家教
英語口語練習，適合初來美國的9-12年級學生，一小時十元。在圖書館或在您家。
下午三點後致電678-5637

课后英语家教
英语口语练习，适合初来美国的9-12年级学生，一小时十元。在图书馆或在您家。
下午三点后致电678-5637
content.question: The service is particularly targeted toward

choices.label: students who have never been to the United States
students who do not speak English fluently

content.answer: students who do not speak English fluently
